ygData.subject: Re: Beachcomber and Redhot
ygData.msgSnippet: Cliffjumper looked relieved. Well that s a relief. I thought you were going to say you were related to Megatron or something. Cliffjumper said. I m not

Cliffjumper looked relieved. "Well that's a relief. I thought you were
going to say you were related to Megatron or something." Cliffjumper
said. "I'm not gonna hold killing a Predacon against you, we're in a
war, and casualties happen. Better them than us."
